author: Tay Yong Kwang J (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: Law Society of Singapore v Chen Kok Siang Joseph
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Tay Yong Kwang J; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Ramesh Tiwary (Edmond Pereira and Partners) for the applicant; Respondent absent and unrepresented
tags-parsed: Legal Profession/Show cause action/Advocate and solicitor misrepresenting to prison authorities his relationship with prisoner-client by posing as prisoner's friend in order to interview prisoner in prison/Whether advocate and solicitor's conduct amounting to misconduct unbefitting an advocate and solicitor/Whether appropriate for court to grant application/Appropriate penalty/Sections 83(1), 83(2)(h) Legal Profession Act (Cap 161, 2001 Rev Ed)
